cab.content: 9 Co 39(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)59C. (63) 123 COPY NO, mmmm^mm10th July, 196.3,CABINETFEDERATION OF RHODESIA AND NYASALANDMemorandum by the First Secretary ,of state circulate for the information of my colleagues a White Paper,which is being laid to-day, containing the full report of the central africa conference held at the Victoria Falls from 28th June to3rd July, 1963.Office of the First Secretary of State, S. W. 1.10th July, 1963
